relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

name: MPEG-1 and MPEG-2 Layer II Audio Encoding
description: Often referred to as MP2, lossy audio compression that derives from the MUSICAM audio codec and employs perceptual compression.  Defined for MPEG-1 in ISO/IEC 11172-3 and for MPEG-2 in ISO/IEC 13818-3.
